page.title: 01General Description.
page.content: This area of undulating{LANDSCAPE } encloses 95% of residential Garboldi- sham, Smallworth and Blo-Norton. {LAND COVER-}Arable & animal farms, woods, fens, reedbeds and grassland. Within the non-farming community there are a number of home based{BUSINESSES a metal fabricating works and a heavy plant hire firm. {AMENITIES-}1 small food shop & P/O, 2 telephone kiosks, 3 post boxes, 1 general store and filling station, 1 pub, 3 churches (1 ruined), a chapel, 1 antique shop, 2 village halls,1 pavilion and 1 primary school. { }Main water and electricity is available but not gas. Most residents have septic tank sanitation.There is no policeman, no surgery, no street names or lights. Some wells remain. Some bus services exist but cars are a virtual necessity for normal living.
